metadata.title: CVE-2024-1066 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions from13.3.0 prior to 16.6.7, 16.7 prior to 16.7.5, and 16.8 prior to 16.8.2which allows an attacker to do a resource exhaustion using GraphQL`vulnerabilitiesCountByDay`

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
